title: Drawing, "How To Make Your Commercial Vehicle Pay", ca. 1935
medium: Brush and gouache, graphite on cream thick paper
signed: Signed in blue gouache, below the center tire: E. McK. Kauffer
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, upper and lower margins: Solid line
creditline: Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer
description: This advertisement poster depicts a workman, cigarette in hand, leaning against the front left fender of a large lorry. Text, lower right: [in red:] HOW TO MAKE / [in black:] YOUR COMMERCIAL / [in blue:] VEHICLE PAY.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "How To Make Your Commercial Vehicle Pay", ca. 1935.
ca. 1935. Brush and gouache, graphite on cream thick paper. Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer. 1963-39-723.
